name: Trello classic label colours
description: Atlassian changed the classic Trello label colours in 2023. This style restores them to the cheerful and bright, pre-2023 palette.
additional_info:
Version 1.2.0 2023-05-27.

Tested on Google Chrome 113.0.5672.127 (Official Build) (64-bit) and Mozilla Firefox 113.0.1 (64-bit).
